price: And among them, there are illiterate people, who know nothing of the Scripture except wishful thinking, and they do nothing but guesswork.
arabic: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُمِّيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّآ أَمَانِيَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
